info.title: Superseeded API
info.description: Modern nursery industry API for reconciling plant specifications, resolving equivalence and assessing logistical risks for plant stock.

tags.name: Resolvers
tags.description: Endpoints for cleaning, normalizing, and interpreting messy nursery data.

get.description: Returns a list of available API routes that can be called after a file upload completes. This allows integrations to dynamically discover what processing options are available.

200.description: List of available post-upload processing routes

get.description: Verifies that the API gateway and underlying matcher services are operational.

post.description: Unified endpoint for resolving plant specifications. Accepts input as: (1) JSON body with items array, (2) JSON body with file_url from TUS upload, or (3) multipart form-data with direct file upload. Supported file formats: JSON, XLSX, XLS, PDF, TXT, PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP. Authentication: Basic/Pro plans use X-API-Key header; Teams plans with platform integration require Authorization Bearer token.

requestBody.description: Object containing a list of raw spec strings to be resolved.

200.description: Successful resolution with detailed hierarchy data.

routes.description: List of available post-upload processing routes

version.description: API version for the route schema

routes.name: Resolve Specifications
routes.description: Classify pot sizes and plant specifications into Growth Equivalent Hierarchy categories

name.description: Human-readable route name for display in UIs

description.description: Description of what this route does
description.example: Classify pot sizes and plant specifications into Growth Equivalent Hierarchy categories

requires_auth.description: Whether the route requires a delegation token

accepted_file_types.description: File extensions this route can process

ResolveSpecsRequest.description: Request body for /resolve/specs. Accepts items array, file_url, or multipart file upload.

items.description: An array of raw strings representing pot sizes or plant states. Takes precedence over file inputs.

file_url.description: URL to a previously uploaded file (from TUS storage). Must be from secure.superseeded.ai or api.superseeded.ai.

filename.description: Optional filename hint for format detection when using file_url.

extraction_type.description: What to extract from files: pot_sizes, species, or generic.

input_label.description: The original raw string provided in the request.

match_confidence.description: The confidence level of the semantic match.

external_ids.description: A map of foreign key IDs from external systems.

evergreenconnect_potsize_id.description: The precise Evergreen Connect ID if an exact match is found.

ContainerProfile.description: The standardized biological and logistical profile for this container type.

type.description: The standardized unique key for this container type.

stage_order.description: Numeric sort order for biological maturity (0=Seed, 5=Mature, 99=Non-Plant).

stage_name.description: Human-readable category of the production stage.

is_biological.description: Indicates if the item is a living plant vs hard goods.

matching_strategy.description: Hint for how to compare stock of this type (e.g., Volume vs Diameter).

is_stackable.description: If true, items can be stacked vertically, reducing freight cost.

inspection_focus.description: The primary attribute to check during quality inspection.

customer_note.description: User-friendly note explaining the pros/cons of this type.
customer_note.example: Superior root structure; requires more frequent watering until planted.
